00065 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00066 {
00067     string systemStatusFileName = "";
00068     string systemLogFileName = "";
00069     string systemErrorFileName = "";
00070     string commandSystemStatus = "";
00071     string commandLog = "";
00072     string commandError = "";
00073     Screen screen;
00074     fd_set rfds;
00075     struct timeval tv;
00076     int retVal = -1;
00077     char line[2048];
00078 
00079     Components componentDetails;
00080 
00081     // Print help if not enough arguments on the command line
00082     if (argc < 3)
00083     {
00084         fprintf(stderr, "\nsonataInfoDisplay - curses display for SonATA information\n\n");
00085         fprintf(stderr, "  USAGE: sonataInfoDisplay <sse-system-status.txt> \\\n");
00086         fprintf(stderr, "         <systemlog-YYYY-MM-DD.txt> <errorlog-YYYY-MM-DD.txt>\n");
00087         fprintf(stderr, "  NOTE:  The arguments need to be the file prefixed with the path.\n\n");
00088         return(1);
00089     }
00090 
00091     // Read in the arguments.
00092     systemStatusFileName = argv[1]; 
00093     systemLogFileName    = argv[2]; 
00094     systemErrorFileName  = argv[3]; 
00095 
00096     //Touch the files to make sure they exists
00097     string touchCommand = "touch " + systemStatusFileName;
00098     system(touchCommand.c_str());
00099     touchCommand = "touch " + systemLogFileName;
00100     system(touchCommand.c_str());
00101     touchCommand = "touch " + systemErrorFileName;
00102     system(touchCommand.c_str());
00103 
00104     //Create the commands to read in the files
00105     FILE *statusFp = NULL;
00106     FILE *logFp = NULL;
00107     FILE *errorFp = NULL;
00108 
00109     commandSystemStatus = systemStatusFileName;
00110     commandLog          = systemLogFileName;
00111     commandError        = systemErrorFileName;
00112 
00113     statusFp = fopen(commandSystemStatus.c_str(), "r");
00114     if(statusFp == NULL)
00115     {
00116         fprintf(stdout," Could not open %s, EXITING.\n",
00117                 commandSystemStatus.c_str());
00118     }
00119 
00120     logFp = fopen(commandLog.c_str(), "r");
00121     if(logFp == NULL)
00122     {
00123         fclose(logFp);
00124         fprintf(stdout," Could not open %s, EXITING.\n", commandLog.c_str());
00125     }
00126 
00127     errorFp = fopen(commandLog.c_str(), "r");
00128     if(errorFp == NULL)
00129     {
00130         fclose(errorFp);
00131         fprintf(stdout," Could not open %s, EXITING.\n", commandError.c_str());
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00135     //Get the file descriptors from file pointers.
00136     int statusFd = fileno(statusFp);
00137     int logFd = fileno(logFp);
00138     int errorFd = fileno(errorFp);
00139 
00140     //Figure out the max file descriptor to use in the select() call.
00141     int maxFd = statusFd;
00142     if(logFd > maxFd) maxFd = logFd;
00143     if(errorFd > maxFd) maxFd = errorFd;
00144 
00145     //Initialize the curses screen.
00146     screen.init();
00147     screen.screenResize(0);
00148 
00149     time_t lastStatusTime = time(NULL);;
00150     int linesSinceLastStatus = 0;
00151 
00152     //Loop foever
00153     while(1)
00154     {
00155 
00156         FD_ZERO(&rfds);
00157         FD_SET(0, &rfds);
00158         FD_SET(statusFd, &rfds);
00159         FD_SET(logFd, &rfds);
00160         FD_SET(errorFd, &rfds);
00161 
00162         tv.tv_sec = 0;
00163         tv.tv_usec = 200000; //1/5 second
00164 
00165         retVal = select(maxFd+1, &rfds, NULL, NULL, &tv);
00166 
00167         //Process any data read from the status file.
00168         if(FD_ISSET(statusFd, &rfds))
00169         {
00170             fgets(line, sizeof(line)-1, statusFp);
00171             if(line[0] != 0 && componentDetails.addWithFilter(line))
00172                 screen.paint(&componentDetails);
00173             linesSinceLastStatus++;
00174             memset(line, 0, sizeof(line));
00175         }
00176 
00177         //The trigger for the end of a status screen paint is "===..." but sometimes
00178         //this does not arrive, so we have to force it.
00179         if(linesSinceLastStatus > 0 && (int)(time(NULL) - lastStatusTime) > 1)
00180         {
00181             linesSinceLastStatus = 0;
00182             lastStatusTime = time(NULL);
00183             componentDetails.addWithFilter("====================================");
00184             screen.paint(&componentDetails);
00185         }
00186 
00187         //Process the log file
00188         if(FD_ISSET(logFd, &rfds))
00189         {
00190         }
00191 
00192         //Process the error file
00193         if(FD_ISSET(errorFd, &rfds))
00194         {
00195         }
00196 
00197         screen.processKey(&componentDetails);
00198     }
00199 
00200 
00201     return 0;

00203 }
